channel.title: Conduit / @conduitxyz

item.title:
RT by @conduitxyz: There's only one coin that can sit around and do nothing
Every other coin must fight and scrap for survival
Let's have Ethereum ship this year
item.dc:creator: @KAndrewHuang

item.title: R to @conduitxyz: That’s all for now, but more integration partners are onboarding all the time. Keep an eye on our tweets to be the first to know any time Conduit Marketplace brings on new providers to make your rollup better.
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description: That’s all for now, but more integration partners are onboarding all the time. Keep an eye on our tweets to be the first to know any time Conduit Marketplace brings on new providers to make your rollup better.

item.title:
R to @conduitxyz: DIA is a trustless, decentralized network of oracles that can give your chain price feeds for any asset, random number generation, and more.
@DIAdata_org is a permissionless network powered by its Lasernet rollup, ensuring trustless computation and total verifiability.
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description:
DIA is a trustless, decentralized network of oracles that can give your chain price feeds for any asset, random number generation, and more.

@DIAdata_org is a permissionless network powered by its Lasernet rollup, ensuring trustless computation and total verifiability.

item.title:
R to @conduitxyz: ZNS Connect is reimagining onchain identity. Let your users replace clunky wallet addresses with customized profile pages and catchy domain names.
Each @ZNSConnect page links with users’ social profiles and lets them share their bio, picture, location, and more.
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description:
ZNS Connect is reimagining onchain identity. Let your users replace clunky wallet addresses with customized profile pages and catchy domain names.

Each @ZNSConnect page links with users’ social profiles and lets them share their bio, picture, location, and more.

item.title:
R to @conduitxyz: Crossmint offers a full suite of tools for onchain app development.
Your rollup’s dev community can get embedded wallets, auth + onboarding, tokenization, credentials, fiat on/off-ramps, and more—all in one simple package—with @crossmint.
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description:
Crossmint offers a full suite of tools for onchain app development.

Your rollup’s dev community can get embedded wallets, auth + onboarding, tokenization, credentials, fiat on/off-ramps, and more—all in one simple package—with @crossmint.

item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description:
Hexagate stops DeFi hacks before they happen.

@hexagate_ uses real time monitoring to detect and prevent exploits on your chain early, and also protects your users from phishing and fraud.

Integrate Hexagate to make your chain safer.

item.title:
R to @conduitxyz: Gas dot zip is the fastest one-stop gas refuel bridge for over 250 chains.
With @gasdotzip, users can instantly bridge to multiple destination chains in a single transaction. Integrate your rollup and make onboarding easier for your users.
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description:
Gas dot zip is the fastest one-stop gas refuel bridge for over 250 chains.

With @gasdotzip, users can instantly bridge to multiple destination chains in a single transaction. Integrate your rollup and make onboarding easier for your users.

item.title:
R to @conduitxyz: Uniblock is the web3 API hub that lets devs go God Mode.
@Uniblock gives developers on your chain access to 1,500 APIs across 100 chains and 50 partners so they can stay agile, consolidate tooling costs, and build anything.
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description:
Uniblock is the web3 API hub that lets devs go God Mode.

@Uniblock gives developers on your chain access to 1,500 APIs across 100 chains and 50 partners so they can stay agile, consolidate tooling costs, and build anything.

item.title:
R to @conduitxyz: Web3Auth is the Wallets-as-a-Service provider that supercharges your rollup’s UX instantly.
@Web3Auth uses the latest account abstraction innovations to make wallets easy for users: Seedless logins, native mobile, fiat on-ramp support, and more.
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description:
Web3Auth is the Wallets-as-a-Service provider that supercharges your rollup’s UX instantly.

@Web3Auth uses the latest account abstraction innovations to make wallets easy for users: Seedless logins, native mobile, fiat on-ramp support, and more.

item.title: We’re ready to welcome even more new providers on Conduit Marketplace! Here are some of the great tools you can integrate with your rollup on Conduit.
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description: We’re ready to welcome even more new providers on Conduit Marketplace! Here are some of the great tools you can integrate with your rollup on Conduit.

item.title:
RT by @conduitxyz: Huge milestone for Blackbird. Flynet isn’t just a new payments network—it’s a new financial infrastructure for the restaurant industry, built on a rollup.
Big things ahead!
item.dc:creator: @KAndrewHuang
item.description:

Big things ahead!

item.title:
R to @conduitxyz: Apps like Blackbird are paving the way for a decentralized internet, where users do everything they can in web2, but better and onchain.
It’s been a blast helping the team bring this vision to life.
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description:
Apps like Blackbird are paving the way for a decentralized internet, where users do everything they can in web2, but better and onchain.

It’s been a blast helping the team bring this vision to life.

item.title:
R to @conduitxyz: All Blackbird check-ins happen onchain. Flynet processes users’ activity and rewards them in $FLY, which can be used to pay at Blackbird restaurants, just like cash 🤯
Blackbird has serious traction too, with over 57,000 addresses holding a membership NFT.
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description:
All Blackbird check-ins happen onchain. Flynet processes users’ activity and rewards them in $FLY, which can be used to pay at Blackbird restaurants, just like cash 🤯

Blackbird has serious traction too, with over 57,000 addresses holding a membership NFT.
